TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PipeStream extends System.IO.Stream
Public MustInherit Class PipeStream Inherits Stream
public ref class PipeStream abstract : System::IO::Stream

summary.span: 公開管道的 物件，其兼具匿名與具名管道的支援。

span.span: Exposes a object around a pipe, which supports both anonymous and named pipes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供基底類別的.NET Framework 中的具名和匿名管道作業。The class provides the base class for named and anonymous pipes operations in the .NET Framework. 使用和具名的管道作業的類別。Use the and classes for named pipe operations. 使用和匿名管道作業的類別。Use the and classes for anonymous pipe operations. 如需有關管道的詳細資訊，請參閱[管道](~/docs/standard/io/pipe-operations.md)。For more information about pipes, see [Pipes](~/docs/standard/io/pipe-operations.md). 如需匿名管道的範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用匿名管道進行本機處理序間通訊](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-anonymous-pipes-for-local-interprocess-communication.md)。For an example of anonymous pipes, see [How to: Use Anonymous Pipes for Local Interprocess Communication](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-anonymous-pipes-for-local-interprocess-communication.md). 如需具名管道的範例，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用具名管道進行網路處理序間通訊](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md)。For an example of named pipes, see [How to: Use Named Pipes for Network Interprocess Communication](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md).

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個類別無法繼承由部分信任的程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.span: 要讀取資料的緩衝區。

span.span: The method to call when the asynchronous read operation is completed.

param.span: 使用者所提供的物件，其可以從其他要求中區分出這個特定非同步讀取的要求。

span.span: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests.

summary.span: 開始非同步的讀取作業。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous read operation.
An object that references the asynchronous read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回傳遞物件至方法來判斷多少位元組被讀取，並釋放用於讀取的作業系統資源。Pass the returned object to the method to determine how many bytes were read and to release operating system resources used for reading. 必須針對每次呼叫一次呼叫。 must be called once for every call to . 這可以在相同的程式碼呼叫或在傳遞至回呼。This can be done either in the same code that called or in a callback that is passed to . 使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件支援讀取作業。Use the property to determine whether the current object supports read operations. 如果管道已關閉或無效的引數傳遞至，會立即引發適當的例外狀況。If the pipe is closed or an invalid argument is passed to , the appropriate exceptions are raised immediately. 執行要求的執行緒集區執行緒上，就會發生在非同步讀取要求期間發生的錯誤。Errors that occur during an asynchronous read request occur on the thread pool thread that is performing the request. 程式碼呼叫時，會引發例外狀況方法。The exceptions are raised when the code calls the method.

span.span: is .
is less than 0.
-or-
is less than 0.

exception.span: 大於 中的可用位元組數目。

span.span: is greater than the number of bytes available in .
The pipe is closed.
The pipe does not support read operations.

exception.span: 管道已中斷連接、正在等候連接，或尚未設定控制代碼。

span.span: The pipe is disconnected, waiting to connect, or the handle has not been set.

exception.span: 管道已中斷，或發生另一個 I/O 錯誤。

span.span: The pipe is broken or another I/O error occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);
override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 叫用受保護方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. 當處置參數是`true`，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個物件參考。When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this object references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

span.para: 在衍生類別，讓所有中的清除邏輯方法。 可以由其他物件呼叫多次。覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊並，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

In derived classes, put all cleanup logic in the method. can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回先前調用所指定的字節數組中讀取的字節數。This method returns the number of bytes read into the byte array specified by the earlier call to . 傳回傳遞物件至方法來判斷多少位元組被讀取，並釋放用於讀取的作業系統資源。Pass the returned object to the method to determine how many bytes were read and to release operating system resources used for reading. 必須針對每次呼叫一次呼叫。 must be called once for every call to . 這可以在相同的程式碼呼叫或在傳遞至回呼。This can be done either in the same code that called or in a callback that is passed to . 使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件支援讀取作業。Use the property to determine whether the current object supports read operations. 如果管道已關閉或無效的引數傳遞至，會立即引發適當的例外狀況。If the pipe is closed or an invalid argument is passed to , the appropriate exceptions are raised immediately. 執行要求的執行緒集區執行緒上，就會發生在非同步讀取要求期間發生的錯誤。Errors that occur during an asynchronous read request occur on the thread pool thread that is performing the request. 程式碼呼叫時，會引發例外狀況方法。The exceptions are raised when the code calls the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人及/或群組，或沒有，在指定的檔案上執行特定動作的權限。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals and/or groups that have, or do not have, rights to perform specific actions on a specified file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).

span.span: The pipe is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`true`只有當物件連接。The property returns `true` only if the object is connected. 如果這個屬性會傳回`false`，管道可能正在等候連接，或可能已中斷連線、 關閉，或中斷。If this property returns `false`, the pipe may be waiting to connect, or may be disconnected, closed, or broken.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Read (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 Read([in]unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (buffer As Byte(), offset As Integer, count As Integer) As Integer
public: override int Read(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int offset, int count);
override this.Read : byte[] * int * int -> int

param.name: buffer
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含其值介於 offset 和 (offset + count - 1) 之間，並由讀取自目前來源的位元組取代的指定位元組陣列。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.

param.name: offset
param.span: 要將讀取位元組放入其中之「緩衝區」陣列中的位元組位移。

span.span: The byte offset in the buffer array at which the bytes that are read will be placed.

param.name: count
param.span: 要讀取的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to read.

summary.span: 讀取資料流的位元組區塊，並將資料寫入指定的緩衝區。

span.span: Reads a block of bytes from a stream and writes the data to a specified buffer.

returns.span: 讀入 中的位元組總數。

span.span: The total number of bytes that are read into .

returns.span: 如果目前無法取得要求的位元組數目，此數目可能小於該位元組數目；如果已到達資料流結尾，則此數目為 0。

span.span: This might be less than the number of bytes requested if that number of bytes is not currently available, or 0 if the end of the stream is reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否目前物件支援讀取作業。Use the property to determine whether the current object supports read operations. 呼叫方法會封鎖直到`count`會讀取的位元組或資料流結尾為止。Calling the method blocks until `count` bytes are read or the end of the stream is reached. 非同步讀取作業，請參閱和。For asynchronous read operations, see and . ## Examples 下列範例會建立匿名管道用戶端和管道伺服器。The following example creates an anonymous pipe client and pipe server. 管道伺服器使用方法來讀取管道用戶端，做為驗證程式碼中的一系列的位元組。The pipe server uses the method to read a series of bytes from the pipe client as a validation code. 管道用戶端和管道伺服器屬於相同的範例。Both the pipe client and the pipe server are part of the same example. 此範例的伺服器部分會建立用戶端處理序，並將它做為引數傳遞匿名管道控制代碼。The server portion of the example creates a client process and passes it an anonymous pipe handle as an argument. [!code-cpp[System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.pipes.pipestream/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.pipes.pipestream/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.pipes.pipestream/vb/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取控制清單 (ACL) 會描述個人及/或群組，或沒有，在指定的檔案上執行特定動作的權限。An access control list (ACL) describes individuals and/or groups that have, or do not have, rights to perform specific actions on a specified file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
